word:
Visiting Churches in Michigan 

     With the encouragement which this dream gave me, I at once decided to accompany my husband and 
                                                                           185
Brother Andrews to Gratiot, Saginaw, and Tuscola counties, and trust in the Lord to give me strength to labor. So, on the 7th of February, we left home, and rode fifty-five miles to our appointment at Alma. Here I labored as usual, with a good degree of freedom and strength. The friends in Gratiot County seemed interested to hear.
